name: Quetrix
description:
The gaming principle of this browser-game is easy to explain: Merge clusters of color-blocks! And: The moving cluster has to be "the bigger one".

Coming from this simple rule (and with the help of several extra features like bombs, free moves, free colors etc.) you get challenged in 24 levels.

Highscores - for each level and overall - are tracked. There is also a basic chat-funktion to share experiences and strategies with other players. 

Try it out!

Feedback is highly appreciated!
